titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Brooklyn and New York City business catalogs collection 1986.047
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:20:08 +0000.

did.unittitle: Brooklyn and New York City business catalogs collection

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Dr. Jaeger's Sanitary Woolen System Company

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: South Brooklyn Moulding Mill (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)

did.abstract: This collection contains sales catalogs of businesses located in Brooklyn and New York City, including Bellows & Company Wines, E.W. Bliss Company, South Brooklyn Moulding Mill, Abraham & Straus, Dr. Jaeger's Sanitary Woolen System Company, and the Bedell Company.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn and New York City business catalogs collection, 1986.047, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Dwight B. Demeritt, Jr., 1986.
